item.title: Hello World. (Again...)
item.description: Another soon-to-be-abandoned project, I’m sure. I’ve been working professional with computers for almost 16 years, been a runner for almost 25 years, been a dad for almost 7 years, and I’ve realized I’m a lifelong learner. I realized recently that I spend way too much time consuming information without really thinking critically about it or doing much with it. This blog will provide me a space to reflect on what I’m doing with software, running, parenting, or just interesting ideas/books/articles/thoughts I come across.
